import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import NavBar from'./components/NavBar';import{Box,Button,Stack,TextField,Typography,Divider}from'@mui/material';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function LoginPage(){const[name,setName]=useState('');const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[loggedIn,setLoggedIn]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const storedName=localStorage.getItem('name');const storedEmail=localStorage.getItem('email');if(storedName&&storedEmail){setName(storedName);setEmail(storedEmail);setLoggedIn(true);}},[]);const handleLogin=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(name&&email){localStorage.setItem('name',name);localStorage.setItem('email',email);setLoggedIn(true);}};const handleLogout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('name');localStorage.removeItem('email');setName('');setEmail('');setLoggedIn(false);};const handleProvider=provider=>{// Placeholder for Google/Facebook login integrations
alert("This would start the ".concat(provider," login flow."));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavBar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{p:2},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h4",component:"h1",gutterBottom:true,children:"Login"}),loggedIn?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{sx:{mb:2},children:["Logged in as ",name," (",email,")"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",onClick:handleLogout,children:"Log Out"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Stack,{component:"form",onSubmit:handleLogin,spacing:2,sx:{maxWidth:360},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"Name",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"Email",type:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",type:"submit",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Divider,{children:"or"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outlined",onClick:()=>handleProvider('Google'),children:"Login with Google"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outlined",onClick:()=>handleProvider('Facebook'),children:"Login with Facebook"})]})]})]});}
